narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Moonlight Mountain Recovery, INC is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Pocatello, ID. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $17.6M in Medicaid payments across 56K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $17.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
